name: Switchero
description:
Equipped with a time-piece allowing you to switch between dimensions, you are on a quest to collect gems which have potential to restore a broken future. 

Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement

"x": Switch dimensions with your time-piece

"space": Dash

Credits:

Created by: Bernard Chen & Kevin Liang

Artwork: Kevin Liang

With music by: Galgox, ViLXDRYAD, MiDoRi, Robyn

Created with Godot Engine
